item.title: Machine Learning Flashcards from Twitter -- Part 1 Data Collection and Preprocessing
item.author: tutysara at google mail.com (tutysara)
item.description: I was searching the net for mlflashcards, I found this incredible machine learning flashcard tweet series from Chris Albon. It looks pretty and covers a lot of ground, Got a thought – why not download them for later use? I thought it would be a fun exercise to start the weekend and jumped into action. Step 1 – Collect/Scrape data from twitter I evaluated using twitter api using tweetpy, but it has its own limitation aka we can search only a week worth of data which is not good for our use case.
